title: Rodemi
author: Rodemi
content: I've been following some hash board repair tutorials online recently, and I'm trying to solve some simple problems myself. I would like to know what repair tools are easy to use and valuable?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: There's no easy to use unless you are skilled all tools needed for repairing hashboard are BGA hotair, Soldering iron, soldering lead, solder paste, Multimeter, test fixture and hashboard code editor.I would like to suggest you if you want to learn about repairing hashboard then only one website that I know this one https://www.zeusbtc.com/ASIC-Miner-Repair/All tools you need are I think included in their PDF guides.

comments.author: Rodemi
comments.body: Thanks for your reply, I found some recommended repair tools in their repair guide. And this site is full of accessories, when I need accessories, I think I will contact them first.
